cards.title: Robust Optimization
content: We solve real-world problems using state-of-the-art optimization techniques.
- Tail Assignment – (Aviation): Assign aircraft to flights while minimizing changes, delays, and maintenance impact.
- Lot Sizing – (CPG / Manufacturing): Minimize production costs and maximize efficiency.
- Distribution Optimization – (Logistics): Route design that cuts distribution costs by over 20%.

cards.title: Forecasting & Demand Planning
content: Custom time-series models that predict short-, medium-, and long-term trends.

• Sales Forecasting – (Retail): Incorporates macroeconomic variables like GDP and exchange rates. We can include as many exogenous variables as are available and design individual time series models for each SKU to maximize forecasting accuracy and business impact.
• Inventory Planning – Retail Chains: Predicts consumption and automates restocking

cards.title: Personalization & Recommendations
content: AI that drives loyalty, increases average ticket size, and deepens customer insight.
• Smart Promotions: Personalized offers based on customer behavior
• Recommender Systems: Suggests products not yet bought using graph theory and ML.
• Loyalty Analytics: Behavioral clustering to improve retention.
